alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 12:26PM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Southwest winds from 15 to 25 mph with gusts from 30 to 40 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds will decrease Wednesday evening and turn easterly overnight. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from noon Today to 8 AM Thursday: Fredonia 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 6 to 10 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
